content.text: Ahiru is the Deputy Commander (副隊長 Fuku taichō) of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Belo Betty.

Ahiru is a woman with tanned skin, prominent lips and long brown hair. Her left arm is a mechanical prosthesis with light and dark green coloring. She wears a black shirt, a red tie and a green jacket. She also has a pair of goggles on her head.

As a member of the Revolutionary Army, Ahiru has no qualms with challenging the World Government, especially with her status as an officer. As such, she is a brave woman as she has made enemies with one of the most powerful forces in the world.
As a deputy commander within the Revolutionary Army, Ahiru has some authority over lower ranking revolutionaries, especially ones within the East Army.
Ahiru was present on Momoiro Island with Belo Betty and Koala after the plan to infiltrate the Levely had been put into action.

elements.text: "Ahiru" (あひる, "Ahiru") means "duck" in Japanese. This follows the theme of female characters being named after birds.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 905 (p. 16) and Episode 883, Ahiru debuts.
↑  SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 93, Ahiru's name and rank revealed.
